additional_info:
Wardrobe 
 New built house in Digomi 7, an elite district, built on the basis of American architecture project. Exterior finished with travertine stone and spec. wood materials. 2 Garages are integrated in the House. The first floor accommodates a living room, dining room, kitchen, Cabinet-bedroom, fireplace, bathroom. The second floor master bedroom, wardrobe and bathroom. 3 bedrooms. Shared bathroom. Large porch and two balconies. The total area of ​​317 sq. M. There are all communications: water, sewer, gas, electricity. House construction is completed, and the external works. The Interior partitions are taken out of the client's desire
